page.title: 04FARMING IN THE TEST VALLEY
page.content: The main occupation in the area is farming.The area is typical of the Hampshire Basin with mixed farming, dairying and market gardening with areas of woodland in between. The climate is mild in winter and warm in summer so that market gardening flourishes.The mild climate also benefits dairying.The grass grows for a long period so that less fodder is needed.Cattle are kept inside in winter.However it is necessary to irrigate some of the pasture in summer by spray irrigation. Three examples of farming were studied;a large modern estate farm,a small mixed farm and a market garden. Marketing the crops,especially the horticultural produce is helped by good roads through the area.
